intro.boost: and boost your study motivation with StudyStream!
intro.description: Self-study becomes more enjoyable than ever with StudyStream

features.focusDescription: Stay focused, study smarter. Our video streams help you eliminate distractions and boost your learning
features.pomoDescription: Easy to use and enhances study efficiency with the Pomodoro method. Focus deeply for 25 minutes, then take a short 5-minute break
features.aiDescription: Experience seamless interactions with our AI chat feature, providing instant support and answers on our website
features.learningDescription: Enhance your learning experience with personalized video sessions. Track your progress, minimize distractions, and achieve your study goals

video.description: Join the room, witness everyone's focus, and boost your motivation

pomodoro working.description: Don't force yourself if you're not truly ready. Focus deeply for 25 minutes, then take a short 5-minute break

ai chat.description: Our AI chatbot is designed to efficiently and accurately answer all your questions, providing quick and reliable assistance

learning.description: Choose a course and start learning something new to improve yourself every day

community.involved: Get involved in our community. Everyone is welcome!
community.facebook: Join our Facebook for support and updates.
community.twitter: To get involved in the community, ask questions and share tips.
community.tiktok: Follow us on Tiktok for videos and contents.
